Play Now HyperCasino Privacy Policy This Privacy Policy ('Policy') describes how HyperCasino, the operator of this offline casino (hereinafter referred to as 'we', 'us', or 'our'), collects, uses, discloses, and protects your personal information when you visit our casino, participate in our games, or interact with our services. 1. Information We Collect We collect information that you provide directly to us, information that we collect automatically when you visit our casino, and information we receive from third-party sources. 1.1 Information You Provide Directly Registration Information: When you register an account with us, we collect your name, email address, date of birth, contact number, address, and gender. Transaction Information: When you make deposits or withdrawals, we collect your financial information such as your bank account details, credit card information, or other payment processing details. Feedback and Support. When you contact our customer support team, we collect your name, email address, and any information you provide to us in your message. 1.2 Information We Collect Automatically Usage Data: We collect information about your use of our casino, including the games you play, your betting patterns, your time spent at the casino, and any other interactions you have with our services. Device Data: We collect information about your device, including your device type, operating system, and unique device identifiers. Location Data: We may collect information about your location, either through your device settings or your interactions with our services, to provide you with relevant services, such as location-based promotions. 1.3 Information We Receive From Third-Party Sources Identity Verification Services: We may use third-party identity verification services to confirm your identity and prevent fraud. Marketing Platforms: We may use third-party marketing platforms to collect information about your interests and tailor our marketing messages to you. 2. How We Use Your Information Providing and Improving Our Services: We use your information to provide you with our casino services, including registering your account, processing your transactions, and providing you with customer support. We also use your information to improve our services, such as by analyzing your usage data to identify areas where we can improve our services. Account Management: We use your information to manage your account, including verifying your identity, preventing fraud, and complying with legal and regulatory requirements. Fraud Prevention and Security: We use your information to prevent fraud, detect and investigate suspicious activity, and protect the security of our casino. 3. Sharing Your Information Service Providers: We share your information with third-party service providers who provide services on our behalf, such as payment processors, marketing platforms, customer support providers, and data analytics providers. Legal and Regulatory Requirements: We may disclose your information to comply with legal and regulatory requirements, such as to law enforcement agencies, government agencies, or regulatory bodies. Business Transactions: We may disclose your information in connection with a business transaction, such as a merger, acquisition, or sale of our assets. 4. Data Security We take reasonable measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no website or app is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee the security of your information. 4. Data Security We take reasonable measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction. However, no website or app is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee the security of your information. 5. Cookies We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to collect information about your use of our website and app. You can disable cookies through your browser settings, but this may affect your ability to use certain features of our website. 6. Your Rights Access: You have the right to access your personal information that we hold. Rectification: You have the right to have your personal information rectified if it is inaccurate or incomplete. Rectification: You have the right to have your personal information rectified if it is inaccurate or incomplete. Erasure: You have the right to have your personal information erased in certain circumstances. 7. Changes to Our Privacy Policy We may update this Policy from time to time. We will post any changes on our website and, if the changes are material, we will notify you by other means, such as email. 8. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about this Policy, please contact us at HyperCasino@gmail.com.
